Nice place to stop for a beer and grab a fun bite. The bravas here are good and original. Definetly try the burger of Peus de Porc. The beers change quite often and even though they lack a bit of country variety they cover most of the beer styles with success. I actually come here when I am in the mood to try something different. Love the stouts and porters they bring.Beer screens should be bigger and even though the guys are very nice some waiters lack a bit of service sensibility. Overall must go place
